channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This Discord feature you barely noticed could now be your biggest privacy risk
item.description: Around 70,000 Discord users may have had images of their government IDs stolen, according to an update from the company. Last week, the popular chat p...

item.title: This New Salesforce AI Service Could Cut IT Helpdesk Calls at Your Company
item.description: The goal, the AI-focused firm said, was to speed up delivery of services IT departments offer.

item.title: Delta’s bet on wealthy Americans driving the economy is working: Premium seats are set to overtake main cabin for the first time in history
item.description: Premium is on track to overtake main cabin in 2026, a year ahead of schedule, per the third-quarter earnings call from America’s most profitable airli...

item.title: Why Workplace Injury Rates Rise When It Gets Hot
item.description: Companies need to be wary of worker injuries when it’s hot outside—or even when it’s hot inside.

item.title: Flight delays are getting worse during the shutdown. What to know if you’re flying
item.description: Flight delays and disruptions at U.S. airports have persisted for a fourth consecutive day due to staffing issues stemming from the government shutdow...

item.title: Should a Leader Delegate More, or Go Full Founder Mode?
item.description: Microsoft’s Satya Nadella delegates. Nvidia’s Jensen Huang is more hands on. Why does a management style work for one, but not the other?

item.title: These 4 Sectors Are Still Recruiting as the Job Market Flattens

item.title: How to manage an employee with a second job or side gig
item.description: There are many reasons why someone may have a second job or some kind of side gig when they’re working for you. They may have financial needs that are...

item.title: From ‘fear factor’ to ‘cognitive fatigue’: KPMG principal on the quarter when everyone started thinking about AI differently
item.description: Rahsaan Shears says we're seeing the rise of "Renaissance skills" but that doesn't mean the workforce will be full of poetry majors.

item.title: This home battery company just raised $1 billion to build a new type of power company

item.title: Gavin Newsom flexes his own ‘MAHA’ plan as he moves to crack down on ultraprocessed foods in school lunch
item.description: The first-in-the-nation law will phase out certain ultraprocessed foods from school meals over a decade.

item.title: Google is tightening its ‘Work from Anywhere’ policy: Now a single day will count as a full week
item.description: The policy may lead to high-performer flight and unhappy workers, experts say.

item.title: This ‘Misery Map’ shows the shutdown’s toll on air travel

item.title: Thousands of Flights Face Delays as Government Shutdown Snarls Air Travel
item.description: As legislators remain at an impasse over the budget, flight delays and cancellations are only expected to get worse.

item.title: A roller derby league from a conservative part of Long Island just blocked New York state’s ban on trans women players

item.title: Social Security’s cost-of-living adjustment isn’t enough for retirees to get by
People pay a lot for insurance. It doesn't always protect them from disaster.
